name: saeven/laminas-assetic
description: Laminas+Assetic module that provides complete integration of Assetic library for PHP 8.1.

suggest.laminas/laminas-mvc: When using this module together with Laminas MVC
suggest.mezzio/mezzio: When using this module together with Mezzio
suggest.mezzio/mezzio-helpers: When using this module together with Mezzio
suggest.mezzio/mezzio-router: When using this module together with Mezzio
suggest.psr/http-server-middleware: When using this module together with Mezzio
suggest.leafo/lessphp: Assetic provides the integration with the lessphp LESS compiler
suggest.leafo/scssphp: Assetic provides the integration with the scssphp SCSS compiler
